1370: Emgelberna moved to Cromme straet.D.2 after marriage.
Got married to Meynolphus at age 16 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Geykonis in 1371 at age 17.
1372: Gave birth to Laurens in 1372 at age 18.
1376: Gave birth to Gobel in 1376 at age 22.
1378: Gave birth to Amalburga in 1378 at age 24.
1379: Lost daughter Amalburga when Amalburga was 2 years old.
1382: Gave birth to Woutermanne in 1382 at age 28.
1383: Gave birth to Salome in 1383 at age 29.
1386: Lost son Laurens when Laurens was 15 years old.
1388: Gave birth to Clara in 1388 at age 34.
1395: Lost daughter Clara when Clara was 8 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
